feature.label: DSSL Metamodel and Tree Editor SDK
feature.description: The DSL-based Systems Specification Language (DSSL) allows to model the design of a DSL being developed and the way it is used in its environment. Goals, requirements and environmental assumptions can then be assigned to elements of this representation of the DSL under development.
